value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04186v1", "title": "Cutoff Sobolev inequalities on the Vicsek and Sierpi\u0144ski fractals", "summary": "We present a direct proof of the cutoff Sobolev inequalities on the Vicsek\nset, the Sierpi\\'nski gasket and the Sierpi\\'nski carpet.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,math.FA,math.MG", "published": "2025-05-07T07:34:37Z"}
